title: Sandisk 8GB EXTREME SDHC HD Video Card Class 6 - 20MB/s (SDSDRX3-8192) [Hassle-Free Packaging]
description: SanDisk Extreme expands its award-winning, professional line of memory cards with a new 8GB SDHC (Secured Digital High Capacity) card. The SanDisk Extreme 8GB SDHC memory card offers speed, performance and reliability to ensure you get your photos every time. A 8GB memory card can store more than 4,000 high-resolution pictures or up to 16 hours of MPEG 4 video. Sandisk 8GB EXTREME SDHC HD Video Card Class 6 - 20MB/s (SDSDRX3-8192) HASSLE FREE (non-retail) Packagaing
